note: ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: EigenLayer's Sepolia deployment uses the SAME mainnet addresses for core contracts (DelegationManager, StrategyManager, etc). AllocationManager and SlashingCoordinator may not be fully deployed on Sepolia testnet yet.

AllocationManager.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è NOT YET DEPLOYED ON SEPOLIA - AllocationManager may not be available

EigenVerify.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è NOT AVAILABLE - Official EigenVerify service not deployed on Sepolia

deployment_status.recommendation: Deploy your own EigenVerify, AllocationManager, and SlashingCoordinator contracts for testing, or use mocks

instructions: 2. ‚ö†Ô∏è AllocationManager & SlashingCoordinator NOT YET on Sepolia testnet
a. Deploy your own EigenVerify contract for proof verification
b. Deploy mock AllocationManager and SlashingCoordinator for testing
c. Test full integration with your VeyraOracleAVS contract
d. Monitor EigenLayer docs for when AllocationManager is deployed to Sepolia
4. Alternative: Consider testing on Holesky testnet if available
5. Verify all addresses on Sepolia Etherscan before use: https://sepolia.etherscan.io
